entry.summary: ...PM-10 HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR PINAL COUNTY FRIDAY... The Pinal County Department of Air Quality has issued a PM-10 High Pollution Advisory for Pinal County including Apache Junction, Casa Grande, Coolidge, and Florence on Friday. entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued April 21 at 2:48PM PDT until April 23 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: .A long period swell of 18 to 20 seconds has arrived as of this afternoon with swell heights over 12 feet. This swell will impact coastal Sonoma County down to coastal Monterey County. entry.cap:areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
